channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: Raizen与中国比亚迪将在巴西建设电动汽车充电站网络
item.description: Sugar and ethanol firm Raizen and Chinese automaker BYD are joining forces to create a network of 600 charging stations for electric vehicles (EVs) in eight Brazilian cities, the companies said on Friday.翻译:糖和乙醇公司 Raizen 和中国汽车制造商比亚迪周五表示，两家公司正在联手在巴西八个城市创建一个由 600 个电动汽车 (EV) 充电站组成的网络。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 苹果在华销量暴跌凸显本土品牌影响力减弱
item.description: Apple's weak China sales performance may have shocked investors, but customers and analysts have been noting the rising challenges the company faces in its third-largest market.翻译:苹果在中国疲软的销售业绩可能令投资者感到震惊，但客户和分析师一直在注意到该公司在第三大市场面临的日益严峻的挑战。
item.author: Yelin Mo, Brenda Goh

item.title: 早盘竞价：科技和 Tnotes：元数据激增和就业机会关注
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 选举前一周，巴基斯坦军方在俾路支省打死 24 名武装分子
item.description: Pakistan's military has killed 24 militants in three days in the restive southwestern province of Balochistan, the military said in a statement on Friday, less than a week before national elections.翻译:巴基斯坦军方周五在一份声明中表示，距离全国选举还不到一周，巴基斯坦军方三天内在动荡的西南部俾路支省打死了 24 名武装分子。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 欧盟消息人士称，法国现在支持欧盟人工智能规则
item.description: France is now backing landmark European Union rules governing artificial intelligence subject to strict conditions, an EU diplomatic source said on Friday, after sources had previously said it was the last holdout in the bloc to support the plan.翻译:一位欧盟外交消息人士周五表示，法国现在支持欧盟在严格条件下管理人工智能的里程碑式规则，此前消息人士曾表示，法国是欧盟最后一个不支持该计划的国家。
item.author: Foo Yun Chee

item.title: 由于担心美国生物技术法案，中国药明康德和药明生物股价跌至多年低点
item.description: Shares of WuXi AppTec Co Ltd and WuXi Biologics (Cayman) tumbled on Friday as investor fears grew over a U.S. draft bill targeting Chinese biotech giants.翻译:由于投资者对美国针对中国生物科技巨头的法案草案的担忧加剧，药明康德有限公司和药明生物（开曼）的股价周五暴跌。
item.author: Summer Zhen

item.title: 德国机械设备制造业协会 (VDMA) 12 月份工程订单下滑趋势有所缓解
item.description: The downward trend in German engineering companies' orders eased in December, as foreign customers helped offset weak domestic results amid ongoing uncertainty in Europe's largest economy, the VDMA association said on Friday.翻译:VDMA协会周五表示，由于欧洲最大经济体持续存在不确定性，外国客户帮助抵消了疲软的国内业绩，12月份德国工程公司订单下降趋势有所缓解。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 亚美尼亚总理帕希尼扬不能再依赖俄罗斯满足军事和国防需求
item.description: Armenia can no longer rely on Russia as its main defence and military partner because Moscow has repeatedly let it down so Yerevan must think about forging closer ties with the United States and France, Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan said.翻译:亚美尼亚总理尼科尔·帕希尼扬表示，亚美尼亚不能再依赖俄罗斯作为其主要国防和军事伙伴，因为莫斯科一再让其失望，因此埃里温必须考虑与美国和法国建立更密切的关系。
item.author: Guy Faulconbridge

item.title: 中国新的房地产融资措施将面临银行谨慎态度的考验
item.description: China aims to ramp up financing for home projects in the coming days as part of its support measures, but banks' reluctance to lend to the crisis-hit sector will remain a major obstacle for the distressed developers who need fresh funding the most.翻译:作为支持措施的一部分，中国计划在未来几天增加住宅项目的融资，但银行不愿向受危机打击的行业提供贷款，这仍将是最需要新资金的陷入困境的开发商的主要障碍。
item.author: Clare Jim, Ziyi Tang

item.title: 腾讯砍掉 Square Enix 的《尼尔》手机游戏，寻找新的热门游戏 - 消息人士
item.description: Tencent halted the development of a highly anticipated mobile game based on Square Enix's "Nier" franchise in December, according to three people with knowledge of the matter, marking a setback in the Chinese gaming giant's hunt for new hits.翻译:据三名知情人士透露，腾讯去年 12 月停止了一款基于 Square Enix 的《尼尔》系列的备受期待的手机游戏的开发，这标志着这家中国游戏巨头寻找新热门游戏的进程遭遇挫折。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 日本经济可能在第四季度恢复增长，但仍然脆弱：路透调查
item.description: Japan's economy likely swung back to growth in the October-December period, helped by a slight pickup in external demand, though analysts warned private consumption remains fragile, a Reuters poll showed on Friday.翻译:路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，在外部需求小幅回升的帮助下，日本经济可能在 10 月至 12 月期间恢复增长，但分析师警告称，私人消费仍然脆弱。
item.author: Satoshi Sugiyama

item.title: 朝鲜在首尔西海岸发射巡航导弹
item.description: North Korea fired multiple cruise missiles off its west coast on Friday, South Korea's military said, marking the fourth time in just over a week that Pyongyang has launched such missiles off both coasts.翻译:韩国军方表示，朝鲜周五在其西海岸发射了多枚巡航导弹，这是平壤在一周多的时间里第四次在两国海岸发射了此类导弹。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着美国就业报告的临近，世界市场欢呼科技股的丰收
item.description: Bumper tech earnings buoyed world stocks on Friday ahead of key U.S. jobs data later in the day that traders are hoping could sway the Federal Reserve towards rate cuts.翻译:周五，在美国关键就业数据公布之前，周五科技股的强劲盈利提振了世界股市，交易员希望这些数据能够影响美联储降息。
item.author: Naomi Rovnick, Dhara Ranasinghe

item.title: 日本向唐纳德·特朗普传达的信息：不要与中国达成协议
item.description: Tokyo has stepped up attempts to engage with people close to Trump in recent weeks.翻译:最近几周，东京加大了与特朗普关系密切人士的接触力度。
item.author: John Geddie, Tim Kelly, Yoshifumi Takemoto

item.title: 美元指数将迎来 2024 年首周下跌；美国就业数据成为焦点
item.description: The dollar index was set for its first weekly fall this year, hurt by lower U.S. bond yields on the back of banking sector jitters, as traders awaited U.S. jobs data due later on Friday for clues on when the Federal Reserve could begin easing rates.翻译:美元指数今年首次周度下跌，因银行业不安导致美国债券收益率下降，交易员等待周五晚些时候公布的美国就业数据，以寻找美联储何时开始降息的线索。
item.author: Rae Wee, Alun John

item.title: 由于中国销售滞后，苹果 iPhone 目标比华尔街目标低数十亿美元
item.description: Apple on Thursday forecast a drop in iPhone sales and targeted overall revenue $6 billion below Wall Street expectations as its China business took a hit.翻译:苹果公司周四预测，由于中国业务受到打击，iPhone 销量将下降，总收入目标将低于华尔街预期 60 亿美元。
item.author: Stephen Nellis

item.title: 独家：中国要求乌克兰将其公司从“战争赞助者”名单中删除
item.description: China demanded on Thursday that Ukraine immediately remove more than a dozen Chinese companies from a list of firms designated as "international sponsors of war", saying it wanted Kyiv to "eliminate negative impacts".翻译:中国周四要求乌克兰立即将十几家中国公司从被指定为“国际战争赞助者”的公司名单中删除，并表示希望基辅“消除负面影响”。
item.author: Tom Balmforth, Pavel Polityuk, Liz Lee

item.title: 香港法院以2019年冲击立法会后骚乱罪判处四人有罪
item.description: A Hong Kong court on Thursday found four people guilty of rioting after the legislature of the financial centre was stormed during pro-democracy protests in 2019, joining eight others who had pleaded guilty to charges over the incident.翻译:周四，香港一家法院认定四人犯有 2019 年民主抗议活动期间冲击金融中心立法机关后发生的骚乱罪，另外八人也承认了对该事件的指控。
item.author: Jessie Pang, Edward Cho

item.title: 中国承诺坚持财政扩张以刺激经济
item.description: China will maintain fiscal expansion this year to spur an economic recovery, Vice Finance Minister Wang Dongwei said on Thursday, reinforcing market views that public spending will be the government's main tool to lift growth.翻译:财政部副部长王东伟周四表示，中国今年将维持财政扩张，以刺激经济复苏，这强化了市场观点，即公共支出将是政府拉动经济增长的主要工具。
item.author: Kevin Yao, Ellen Zhang

item.title: 中国房地产业的下滑可能正在放缓，但尚未复苏
item.description: China's new home prices rose at the fastest monthly pace in nearly 2-1/2 years and government land sales ended a 23-month slump, according to recent government data and a survey, indicating the rate of decline in the embattled property sector may be slowing down.翻译:根据最近的政府数据和一项调查，中国新房价格以近 2-1/2 年来最快的月度涨幅，政府土地销售结束了 23 个月的低迷，这表明陷入困境的房地产行业的下降速度可能是慢下来。
item.author: Liangping Gao, Ryan Woo
